text:
Anyone in UK/London (or from abroad..) interested in seeing or testing the latest big Miltenyi-Lavision Blaze L-sheet?
<https://www.miltenyibiotec.com/GB-en/products/ultramicroscope-blaze.html#gref>

 We are actually demoing here at the Crick <https://www.crick.ac.uk/>  till Friday 24/3
Feel free to contact me and we can probably reserve a slot for you

attachments.fallback: Light sheet Microscope Blaze | 3D Imaging | Products | Miltenyi Biotec | Great Britain
attachments.text: The UltraMicroscope Blaze is a light sheet microscope pre-configured to be used with either the white light laser (WLL) or the beam combiner (BC). The microscope has a fully automated objective turret that hosts up to three MI Plan objective lenses which are optimized for high-resolution light sheet imaging. It also comes with an automated magnification changer (0.6×, 1×, 1.67×, and 2.5×) allowing magnifications from 0.66× to 30×. Fully equipped UltraMicroscope Blaze Beam Combiner 4.2 is a completely configured light sheet microscope with three MI Plan objective lenses (1.1×, 4×, and 12×), five laser lines (405 nm, 488 nm, 561 nm, 639 nm, and 785 nm) and a 4.2 Mpx sCMOS camera.Likewise, fully equipped UltraMicroscope Blaze Beam Combiner 5.5 is a completely configured light sheet microscope with three MI Plan objective lenses (1.1×, 4×, and 12×), dipping caps covering all clearing solutions, 5 laser lines (405 nm, 488 nm, 561 nm, 639 nm, and 785 nm) and a 5.5 Mpx sCMOS camera. | Great Britain
attachments.title: Light sheet Microscope Blaze | 3D Imaging | Products | Miltenyi Biotec | Great Britain

attachments.text: We are a biomedical discovery institute dedicated to understanding the biology underlying health and disease.
